law.text: It is in the best interest of the County to ensure to the greatest extent possible that the County evaluates, utilizes and participates in all systems, programs or other vehicles available for maximizing its receipt of federal matching funds in accordance with the Local Funding Revenue Maximization Act.

The terms used in this Ordinance shall have the following meaning, unless the context clearly implies a different intent:
County shall mean Miami-Dade County and all of its departments, offices, agencies and instrumentalities.
Act shall mean the Local Funding Revenue Maximization Act, Section 409.017, Fla. Stat. (2003), as amended from time to time.
Federal Funds Maximization Program shall mean the County's program for maximizing federal matching funds under the Act.
State shall mean the State of Florida and its agencies or departments that are involved in providing programs for health, social and human services, including, but not limited to, the Agency for Health Care Administration, the Agency for Workforce Innovation, the Department of Children and Family Services, the Department of Elderly Affairs, the Department of Juvenile Justice and the Florida Board of Education.
All other terms used in this Ordinance shall have the same meaning as such terms have in the Act.
law.catch_line: Sec. 2-1753. Participation in State Programs for Federal Matching Funds
law.text:
The County shall:
participate to the greatest extent possible in all programs and mechanisms established by the State pursuant to the Act;
identify all certified local funds of the County (whether County funds or, to the extent provided or allowed by federal law, private funds) which are available, or potentially available, for utilization in maximizing the County's receipt of federal matching funds; and
submit proposals to the State in accordance with the Act and the Federal Funds Maximization Program.
law.catch_line: Sec. 2-1754. Responsibility of County Manager; Administrative Orders
Sec. 2-1755. Receipt of Federal Matching Funds
law.text: Funds received by the County through the Federal Funds Maximization Program shall be disbursed by the Commission by a resolution in a manner that benefits the greatest number of Miami-Dade County residents in need of health, social and human services. The County shall maintain autonomy of revenue maximization funds for which it is awarded.
